definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be loathsome, Bö:§ 1142 (Ar. d-a0ra fastidivit, abhorruit; As. zâru, resist, Impf. izîru, Dl:Pr 65 Schr:COT Gloss);—only 3 fs. [[זׇ֫רָה]] Job 19:17 [[רוּחִי זׇ֫רָה לְאִשְׁתִּי]] my breath is loathsome to my wife ([[וְחַנּׁתִי לְ]] in ‖ cl.); > most, who derive fr. I. [[זוּר]], become strange and so repugnant.
